lines: You are still not completely familiar with using the toilet. It is still quite fascinating to you. You have just finished, and have cleaned yourself like a big girl.

Whoosh! You watch a long ribbon of paper spin and disappear into the bowl.

You pull about thirty feet of toilet paper off the roll and flush the bowl. It fills up all the way to the top with water, then comes rushing out on the floor. As the water comes rushing out, Mom rushes in.
You are not allowed to watch The Suzy Fantastik Cartoon Hour for a week! This is the worst possible punishment.
After three days, the sanction is lifted.
You stand there looking at your mother with your index finger hooked into your bottom lip. The cutesy routine doesn't work. You are sent directly to your room.
You can do one of the following:
#MAKE A BOAT OUT OF MOM'S BRUSH AND FLOAT IT IN THE BOWL
Oops! It doesn't float. You can:
Whoosh! It spins around three times and tries to go down the pipe. Well, halfway down. The water slowly rises and spills out of the toilet. Mom rushes in...
The water is cold! You can:
Mom finds it later in the day. She asks, "Did you do this?" You tell her:
Even though you were honest, you still get punished.
You get a short lecture but avoid punishment, because you were honest.
She didn't catch you red-handed, so you don't get punished. She will trust you less in the future.
You have resisted a strong temptation. You deserve a cookie. There are some on the table over there. Would you like to take one?
You didn't ask permission first. You get caught with your hand in the cookie jar. It's hard for a child your age to be perfect. Don't sweat it.

You are a hard one to fool. You seem to be growing up to be a real goody-two-shoes. We'll see how good you are at remaining this way when someone offers you your first drink of alcohol when you are still under age.
